choices: Try to hide under the bed
Someone come until you think about it
1.content: You look around to discover that you are no more than a 6 inches tall guy in a giant bedroom.The door looks closed and there is no light in the room.
1.title: The start

13.content: Suddendly the door is open,the light comes out when a giant person put the light on.Now that you can see where you are and who it is,you discover that...
13.title: Someone come until you think about it

choices: She grab you with her hand
133.content:
You look up scared to the enormous figure.She looks like she have 12 years more or less.She wears a stripped pyjama and a pair of slippers.She stop and look down at you.Its seems that she notice you.You try to get back and run away,but when you turn back,you can see how she step infront of you,blocking your way,and instantly step back,blocking the other way.You look up at the girl,who have a smirk in her face.

"Is a little guy!!!*-She say excited.
133.title: Is a little girl

choices: You are stuck in her sole because of the sweat
You are in the ground,she grabs you with her hands
1331.content:
She slide her right foot in the air,and bring it down,steping on you.You can see how your body is covered by her sole.She giggles as she feel your attempts to get free,and she like the feeling of your squirming.

-Hehehe,you cant scape little boy!*She say rubing her sole against you.You can barely breath,and the only thing you breath is a smelly air from her foot.

She suddendly lift her foot up again...
1331.title: She steps on you

13311.content:
Hahaha,wow,you like my foot so much,that´s because you are in there huh?*She say looking at her foot.*Well,ill let you enjoy it a bit more.*She giggles,as she bring her foot into the slipper,crushing you again against the soft surface of the insole.You are now in the dark again,trapped in her sweaty slipper.

Finally,she sit on the bed,putting her legs on it and pulling of her slippers,you fall in-front of her feet.
-Hi there!*She smile
13311.title: You are stuck in her sole because of the sweat

info.brief_description: You are a human who crossed a portal to another world, a big one.
